title: Lubricants and Lubrication -  2 Volume Set (3rd Ed)(gnv64)
description: Lubricants and Lubrication - 2 Volume Set (3rd Ed) by Mang, Wilfried Dresel Wiley-VCH | May 2017 | ISBN-10: 3527326707 | ePUB | 1262 Pages | 31.9 mb This completely revised third edition incorporates the latest data available and reflects the knowledge of one of the largest companies active in the business. The authors take into account the interdisciplinary character of the field, considering aspects of engineering, materials science, chemistry, health and safety. The result is a volume providing chemists and engineers with a clear interdisciplinary introduction and guide to all major lubricant applications, focusing not only on the various products but also on specific application engineering criteria. Volume 1 Chapter 1: Lubricants and Their Market Chapter 2: Lubricants in the Tribological System Chapter 3: Rheology of Lubricants Chapter 4: Base Oils Chapter 5: Synthetic Base Oils Chapter 6: Additives Chapter 7: Lubricants in the Environment Chapter 8: Disposal of Used Lubricating Oils Chapter 9: Lubricants for Internal Combustion Engines Chapter 10: Gear Lubrication Oils Chapter 11: Hydraulic Oils Chapter 12: Compressor Oils Chaoter 13: Turbine Oils Volume 2 Chapter 14: Metalworking Fluids Chapter 15: Forming Lubricants Chapter 16: Lubricating Greases Chapter 17: Solid Lubrication Chapter 18: Laboratory Methods for Testing Lubricants Chapter 19: Mechanical-Dynamic Test Methods and Tribology Chapter 20: Lubrication Systems Chapter 21: Removal of Lubricants: Industrial Cleaners Index https://s1.postimg.org/98olo5zllr/Lubricants_and_Lubrication_-_2_Volume_Set_3rd_Ed.jpg
